title: China Zhenjiang Stay with Magnificent Yangtze River Views
description: Against a serene backdrop of the Yangtze River, Crowne Plaza Zhenjiang, an IHG Hotel, boasts modern comforts and a central location. Walk the ancient stone streets of Xijin Ferry or hunt for the perfect purchase at nearby shopping malls. Soothe your body with an Enoch Touch Spa treatment or float in the indoor river-view swimming pool before trying M Cafe's specialty of authentic Zhenjiang noodles or delectable dim sum in HAOCHI's dining room.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Zhenjiang, an IHG Hotel
